vps_dashboard_upgrade_done: Your VPS has been upgraded. Please remember to reboot your VPS in order for the new configuration to be effective.
vps_dashboard_upgrade_error: An error has occurred requesting to upgrade your VPS.
vps_dashboard_upgrade_doing: Your VPS is being upgraded. You will receive a notification message once you can reboot your server to enable the new configuration.
vps_dashboard_migration_warning: Your Cloud VPS 2013/2014 will be migrated automatically from {{date}}. If you would like pick a specific time, you can schedule this operation now.
vps_dashboard_auto_migration_warning: Your Cloud VPS 2013/2014 will be migrated automatically to a VPS from the new range in {{days}} days.
vps_dashboard_migration_in_progress: Your Cloud VPS 2013/2014 is currently migrating to the new range.
vps_dashboard_migration_in_error: An error has occurred migrating your VPS. The rest of the migration process will be managed by our teams.
vps_dashboard_maintenance_warning:
In order to improve stability of our orchestration for VPS service, multiple maintenance will take place in the different VPS zones. The operations will last for a maximum of 2 hours in non-working hours. During the maintenance period, it will not be possible in the affected area to order, modify or delete a VPS.
You can find details zone by zone on this travaux task: http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=47124
